hero.title: Night of the Meteor
hero.subtitle: A Maniac Mansion Fan Remake
hero.description: Welcome to the mansion of the Edison's, you are. Twenty years ago, crash-landed in the Edison's front yard, a large meteor did. The meteor, in fact the infamous Murderous Purple Slimy Meteor it was. The terror of the galaxy, it is! Using Dr. Fred as its tool, the meteor has begun. Swiping teenagers to suck their brains out, it has. The newest kidnap involves Dave's girlfriend Sandy the cheerleader, it does. Not one to take things lightly, Dave is. Enlists the help of friends, he does, and into the mansion to find Sandy, he goes.
hero.descriptionSecondary: Welcome artists, you are! Explore the pixel art universe we're building, you must. Scroll down to discover characters, villains, locations, animations, and music, you can.

characters.title: Characters
characters.description: Meet the cast of Night of the Meteor, you will. Unique abilities and personality to the adventure, each character brings.

dave.name: Dave
dave.description: The hero, he is. Use this guy, you must. No special skills he has, but great soundtrack, yes.

bernard.name: Bernard
bernard.description: The resident geek, he is. Fix the radio to call the meteor police and repair the telephone, he can.

syd.name: Syd
syd.description: The cool musician with awesome shades, he is. Master of the piano, he is.

razor.name: Razor
razor.description: The punk rocker, she is. Great piano player, yes. The same as Syd in every respect but gender, she is.

michael.name: Michael
michael.description: The photographer who can develop film, he is. The only one who can get Weird Ed to help you out, he is.

wendy.name: Wendy
wendy.description: The writer who wants to be a famous novelist, she is. Edit bad manuscripts with typewriters, she can.

jeff.name: Jeff
jeff.description: Beach bum whose only ambition to live in a van by the sea is. Fix the phone, he can.

villains.title: Villains
villains.description: The antagonists of Night of the Meteor, they are. Unique challenges and dark designs, each villain presents.

dr-fred.name: Dr. Fred Edison
dr-fred.description: Resident mad scientist controlled by the meteor, he is. Such a bad guy before the meteor took over, he was not.

edna.name: Nurse Edna Edison
edna.description: One demented lady, she is. The only Edison who will NEVER join your side, she is. Avoid her at all costs, you must.

weird-ed.name: Weird Ed Edison
weird-ed.description: The military guru, he is. The only sane person in the mansion, he is. Get rid of the meteor and save his father, just wants to, he does.

ted.name: Dead Cousin Ted Edison
ted.description: Technically never interacted with since dead he is, but mentioned a lot throughout the mansion, he gets.

green-tentacle.name: Green Tentacle
green-tentacle.description: Too depressed to care about intruders, he is. A useful ally he can be, but manic-depressive and turn violent quickly, he could.

purple-tentacle.name: Purple Tentacle
purple-tentacle.description: Guards the door to Dr. Fred's inner lab, he does. Almost all of the kid's special skills toward getting past this guy, they are geared.

locations.title: Locations
locations.description: Explore the detailed pixel art environments, you must. Crafted with care to create an immersive adventure, each location is.

animations.title: Animations

music.title: Music
